articles.title: Chargers CB J.C. Jackson feels 'defeated' after benching on Monday night - NFL.com
articles.description: Defeated is a word cornerback J.C. Jackson used to describe how he was feeling Wednesday inside the Chargers locker room, just two days after he was benched for the second half and overtime of the team’s Monday night win over the Broncos.
articles.content:
